rules.label: Theater is EMEA AND Partner Event

rules.name: Theater_is_APAC_LDR
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23 OR 24 OR 25 OR 26 OR 27 OR 28)) OR (29 OR 30 OR 31)
rules.label: Theater is APAC LDR

rules.name: Lead_Source_is_Renewals_AND_Theater_is_APAC
rules.label: Lead Source is Renewals AND Theater is APAC

rules.name: Lead_Source_is_Renewals_AND_Theater_is_EMEA
rules.label: Lead Source is Renewals AND Theater is EMEA

rules.name: Lead_Source_is_Renewals_AND_Theater_is_AMERICAS
rules.label: Lead Source is Renewals AND Theater is AMERICAS

rules.name: Lead_Source_is_Partner_AND_Reseller_is_National
rules.label: Lead Source is Partner AND Reseller is National

rules.name: Lead_Source_is_LDR_AND_Theater_is_AMERICAS
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 16 AND 17 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23 OR 24 OR 25 OR 26 OR 27 OR 28 OR 29 OR 30 OR(31 AND 32) OR (33 AND 34))
rules.label: Lead Source is LDR AND Theater is AMERICAS

rules.name: Lead_Source_is_Inside_Sales_AND_Theater_is_AMERICAS
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR (6 AND 10) OR 7 OR 8 OR 9)
rules.label: Lead Source is Inside Sales AND Theater is AMERICAS

rules.name: Lead_Source_is_LDR_AND_Theater_is_EMEA
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 16 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23 OR 24 OR 25 OR 26 OR 27 OR 28 OR 29)
rules.label: Lead Source is LDR AND Theater is EMEA

rules.name: Lead_Source_is_Inside_Sales_AND_Theater_is_EMEA
rules.label: Lead Source is Inside Sales AND Theater is EMEA
